summary: AN ORDINANCE approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6663 for the improvement of N.E. 61st St. from 60th Ave. N.E. to approximately 60 feet west of 65th Ave. N.E.; and certain other avenues; by constructing underground utilities lines and a residential street lighting system in accordance with the provisions of Chapter 144, Laws of 1957; and Chapter 119, Laws of 1967; under Ordinance No. 104961, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
